00023 #ifndef __NITF_FIELD_WARNING_H__
00024 #define __NITF_FIELD_WARNING_H__
00025 
00026 #include "nitf/System.h"
00027 #include "nitf/Field.h"
00028 
00029 NITF_CXX_GUARD
00030 
00031 
00039 typedef struct _nitf_FieldWarning
00040 {
00041     off_t fileOffset;           /* Offset in bytes to the field in the NITF file */
00042     char *fieldName;                /* Name of the offending field in the following format
00043                                        hdr.section(i).  ...  .fieldName
00044                                        section  - Any of the following section abbreviations.
00045                                        If a section can occur more than once (i)
00046                                        will appear where "i" is the occurance number
00047                                        in the order they appear in the file
00048                                        hdr     - Main file header (Identification & Organization Segment)
00049                                        ish(i)  - ith image sub-header
00050                                        imd(i)  - ith image data section
00051                                        gsh(i)  - ith graphics sub-header
00052                                        grd(i)  - ith graphics data section
00053                                        tsh(i)  - ith text sub-header
00054                                        ted(i)  - ith text data section
00055                                        esh(i)  - ith extended data sub-header
00056                                        edd(i)  - ith extended data section
00057 
00058                                        <TRE>(i)- ith occurance of a particular TRE in a particular
00059                                        section (i.e. hdr.ish(2).ACFTB(1).SCNUM */
00060     nitf_Field *field;      /* Original field found in the file */
00061     char *expectation;          /* Description of what was expected */
00062 
00063 }
00064 nitf_FieldWarning;
00065 
00066 
00077 NITFAPI(nitf_FieldWarning *) nitf_FieldWarning_construct(off_t fileOffset,
00078         const char *fieldName,
00079         nitf_Field *field,
00080         const char
00081         *expectation,
00082         nitf_Error *
00083         error);
